summary: "Spider-Man: Homecoming" is a 2017 superhero movie about Peter Parker, a high school student who also fights crime as Spider-Man. He tries to balance school and superhero duties while facing a new villain, the Vulture. The film is part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe and stars Tom Holland as Spider-Man and Michael Keaton as the Vulture. It was well-received and made lots of money. Two sequels have been released, and a new trilogy is in the works.
title: Spider-Man Homecoming
